predicate.note: Frames file for 'brand' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

example.name: funky word order
example.text: In a new TV ad, for instance, a woman going through the Sunday newspaper brands as hype claims by other stores that they are offering goods for ``50%, 60% and 70% off.
